metadata.description: A comprehensive marketplace for Claude Code Agent Skills with curated collections for development, data analysis, productivity, and security workflows

plugins.name: git-automation
plugins.description: Automate Git workflows, generate conventional commit messages, manage branches, and handle repository operations. Use when working with Git repositories, making commits, or managing version control.

plugins.name: code-reviewer
plugins.description: Review code for best practices, security vulnerabilities, and maintainability issues. Use when reviewing pull requests, analyzing code quality, or checking for potential issues and improvements.

plugins.name: data-analysis
plugins.description: Process, analyze, and visualize data from Excel spreadsheets, CSV files, and various data sources. Use when working with spreadsheets, performing statistical analysis, or creating data visualizations.

plugins.name: excel-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze Excel spreadsheets, create pivot tables, and generate business insights. Use when working with Excel files, .xlsx documents, or analyzing tabular data for business intelligence.

plugins.name: documentation-helper
plugins.description: Generate, update, and maintain technical documentation including README files, API docs, and code comments. Use when creating project documentation, API references, or maintaining code documentation.

plugins.name: deployment-tools
plugins.description: Manage CI/CD pipelines, deployment configurations, and infrastructure automation. Use when deploying applications, managing build processes, or configuring deployment workflows.

plugins.name: monitoring-helper
plugins.description: Analyze logs, monitor system performance, and troubleshoot infrastructure issues. Use when debugging applications, analyzing system metrics, or investigating performance problems.

plugins.name: security-scanner
plugins.description: Scan code and systems for security vulnerabilities, compliance issues, and security best practices. Use when conducting security audits, vulnerability assessments, or compliance checks.

plugins.name: task-manager
plugins.description: Organize tasks, plan projects, and track progress with structured workflows. Use when managing projects, creating action items, organizing workflows, or tracking team tasks.

plugins.name: meeting-assistant
plugins.description: Prepare for meetings, take structured notes, and manage action items and follow-ups. Use when organizing meetings, taking notes, managing agendas, or tracking meeting outcomes.

plugins.name: email-processor
plugins.description: Organize, categorize, and respond to emails with intelligent templates and workflows. Use when managing email communications, drafting responses, or organizing inbox workflows.

plugins.name: report-generator
plugins.description: Create structured reports from data sources, analysis results, and business metrics. Use when generating business reports, analytical findings, executive summaries, or data-driven insights.

plugins.name: visualization-helper
plugins.description: Create charts, graphs, and data visualizations from various data sources. Use when creating presentations, reports, or analytical dashboards that require visual data representation.

plugins.name: marimo-notebook
plugins.description: Create, edit, and deploy reactive Python notebooks with marimo. Use when working with data analysis, interactive visualizations, web app development, or when you need reproducible computational notebooks.

plugins.name: claude-thread-publisher
plugins.description: Publish Claude Code conversation threads as static HTML pages hosted on GitHub Gists, with shareable gistpreview permalinks. Use when you want to share, export, or archive Claude Code conversations.

plugins.name: pentest-toolkit
plugins.description: AI-Powered Security Testing Toolkit - Comprehensive penetration testing tools for authorized security assessments. Use when conducting professional security testing, vulnerability assessments, or penetration testing on systems you own or have explicit authorization to test.
